name: automagik-forge

scripts.format: cargo fmt --all && cd frontend && pnpm run format
scripts.check: pnpm run frontend:check && pnpm run backend:check
scripts.dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "pnpm run backend:dev:watch" "pnpm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) pnpm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: DISABLE_WORKTREE_ORPHAN_CLEANUP=1 RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -w crates -x 'run --bin server'

description: Vibe coding orchestrator for human-AI development. You create tasks, choose agents, experiment with approaches, ship code you understand.
author: Genie <genie@namastex.ai>
